actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Labor and Public Welfare (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-316.

official_title: An original resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Labor and Public Welfare for inquiries and investigations.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-316) Authorizes additional expenditures of $1,800,000 by the Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare for inquiries and investigations from March 1, 1975, through February 29, 1976. Stipulates that vouchers covering expenses of the committee under this resolution shall not be required in the case of disbursement of salaries of employees paid at an annual rate.

titles.title: An original resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Labor and Public Welfare for inquiries and investigations.
